Reason: The 'native_transport_idle_timeout_in_ms' configuration is performance-sensitive. The configuration directly affects system performance by managing idle client connections, which can impact resource utilization and system efficiency. Closing idle connections helps in freeing up resources and improving system performance, but setting the idle timeout value too low may prematurely close active connections, affecting system performance negatively.
